mapper.insert: insert into ROOMTYPE (ROOMTYPE_ID, ROOMTYPE_NM, ROOMTYPE_PRICE, ROOMTYPE_PTYPE) values (#{roomtypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomtypeNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomtypePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{roomtypePtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ROOMTYPE_ID, ROOMTYPE_NM, ROOMTYPE_PRICE, ROOMTYPE_PTYPE from ROOMTYPE
